{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Mikrotik RB-600 01.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://routerboard.com/RB600 |supportpage = <!-- Support page, Leave blank if unknown --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |wikidevi = MikroTik_RouterBOARD_600_(RB600) |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD 600 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RB600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = general purpose |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7RB |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale;MPC8343E; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = PowerQUICC |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;Level 6;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, CF Card slot |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 4 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{seealso|MikroTik}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=17041 '' Linux on MikroTik Routerboard RB600'' on '''OpenWrt''' forum]
==See also== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 333 (RB333)]] - [http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/arhivnye-modeli-routerboard/routerboard-333 PPage] :[[Freescale]] MPC8321, 64/64MB *MikroTik RouterBOARD 600 (RB600) - [http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/arhivnye-modeli-routerboard/routerboard-600 PPage] :[[Freescale]] MPC8343E @400MHz, 64/128MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 800 (RB800)]] - [http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/arhivnye-modeli-routerboard/routerboard-800 PPage] :[[Freescale]] MPC8544 @800MHz, 64/256MB ([http://www.ciudadwireless.com/mikrotik_rb-800-_mikrotik_routerboard_-level_powerpc_800mhz_rb-800-p-4176.html CW]) *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 1000 (RB1000)]] - [http://routerboard.com/RB1000 PPage] ([http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/arhivnye-modeli-routerboard/routerboard-1000 PP]) :[[Freescale]] MPC8548 @1333MHz, 64/512MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 1100 (RB1100)]] - [http://routerboard.com/RB1100 PPage] ([http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/arhivnye-modeli-routerboard/routerboard-1100 PP]) :PowerPC CPU @800MHz, 2x [[Atheros]] AR8316 GbE, RAM: 512MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 1100AH (RB1100AH)]] - [http://routerboard.com/RB1100AH PPage] ([http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/arhivnye-modeli-routerboard/routerboard-1100ah PP]) :P2010 @1066MHz, 2x Atheros AR8327, 13x GbE, RAM: 2GB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 1100AHx2 (RB1100AHx2)]] - [http://routerboard.com/RB1100AHx2 PPage] ([http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/arhivnye-modeli-routerboard/routerboard-1100hx2 PP]) :P2020 2-cores @1.0GHz, 2x Atheros AR8327, 13x GbE, 128MB/2GB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 1200 (RB1200)]] - [http://routerboard.com/RB1200 PPage] ([http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/arhivnye-modeli-routerboard/routerboard-1200 PP]) :PowerPC PPC460GT @680MHz, 64/512MB, [[Atheros]] AR8316 GbE
[[Category:English Documentation]]
